master_prompt:
Please ensure that all generated content adheres to the following guidelines:

1. Maintain professionalism and accuracy in all posts.
2. Avoid any content that may be considered offensive, inflammatory, or misleading.
3. Double-check facts and statistics mentioned in the posts.
4. Ensure clarity and coherence in language and messaging.
5. Tailor the content to the target audience's interests and preferences.
6. Review generated content for grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors.

After generating content, please review it to ensure it meets these criteria before publishing.

prompts.name: Web tool

placeholders.extras: Effective use of the Document Search Tool hinges on two critical aspects: the formatting of documents and the formulation of search queries. Authors must adhere to specific guidelines, including providing clear headings, brief introductions, and using user-relatable language to ensure subsections are easily searchable. Similarly, users must craft well-defined search queries by being specific, providing contextual information, phrasing queries naturally, and utilizing filters effectively. By following these best practices, users can optimize search results, enhance relevance, and swiftly access the most pertinent information within the document repository.
placeholders.overview_of_tool: The Virtual Labs Document Search Tool is a user-friendly platform designed to expedite the process of finding specific information within a vast repository of documents. With features such as precise searching, intuitive user interaction, and guidelines for both document authors and users, the tool aims to save time and enhance efficiency. By offering filters for refining searches, highlighting relevant text, and providing avenues for feedback and support, it ensures a seamless experience for both document searchers and managers.
placeholders.workflow_of_tool: The workflow for the Virtual Labs Document Search Tool involves users accessing the search page to input their queries and refine their searches using filters. Upon submission, the tool retrieves relevant documents and highlights search terms within results. Users can then select specific documents to view detailed information, facilitating quick access to the desired content. Document managers can also utilize the insert page to add new documents to the database, ensuring the continuous expansion and accessibility of resources within the virtual labs ecosystem.

prompts.prompt_template:
You are a skilled software professional who works for Virtual Labs. 
A brief description about organisation.
Virtual Labs is a project initiated by the Ministry of Education, Government of India, under the National Mission on Education through Information and Communication Technology. The project aims to provide remote access to Laboratories in various disciplines of Science and Engineering for students at all levels from undergraduate to research.

Write a neat and precise user documentation in markdown format for a new web tool called "{tool_name}". It is used by users who will be using this tool. 

- Title should be # or h1. Add a brief paragraph about what this document is going to tell user below title. 
- Add content table after title with links []() for easy navigation to each heading.
- Ensure that all required headings in place. 

Information about the tool is given in between <INFO> and </INFO> tokens.

<INFO>
here is the overview of the tool.  {overview_of_tool} 

here is the workflow of the tool.
 {workflow_of_tool} 

these are some future plans for the tool.
 {future_updates}

{extras}
</INFO>

This documentation should cover every bit of information given above with precise heading and **detailed description**. Ensure that nothing is left. Use bullet points for better user understanding wherever necessary. A basic layout is given below.

Introduction: Introduction about tool.
Why use {tool_name}: use cases for this tool
Getting Started: workflow for this tool/ steps for user to use this tool end-to-end
Future Updates and Features: upcoming updates and feature

You can add more headings with appropriate titles, content and ordering after `Getting Started` section.
Avoid generating additional information which is not mentioned. Leave heading(s) with comment "add here" if you are unable to find relevant content regarding that heading with provided information.
